heading: HR00418
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO IMMEDIATELY INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ALLEGED ILLEGAL OVERCHARGING OF QUESTIONABLE TRANSMISSION LOSS FEES BY THE POWER SECTOR ASSETS AND LIABILITIES MANAGEMENT CORPORATION (PSALM) ON ELECTRICITY CONSUMERS SERVICED BY THE MANILA ELECTRIC COMPANY (MERALCO) IN THE AMOUNT OF P9.1 BILLION
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00418
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY TO IMMEDIATELY INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ALLEGED ILLEGAL OVERCHARGING OF QUESTIONABLE TRANSMISSION LOSS FEES BY THE POWER SECTOR ASSETS AND LIABILITIES MANAGEMENT CORPORATION (PSALM) ON ELECTRICITY CONSUMERS SERVICED BY THE MANILA ELECTRIC COMPANY (MERALCO) IN THE AMOUNT OF P9.1 BILLION

DATE FILED : 2016-09-30
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-12-19
